column4: hi, i was wondering why i have to use sudo to install everything?
you do not have to use sudo to install EVERYTHING, however many many things require root access in order to affect other parts of the system during the install.
this is part of the security of linux. Things cannot install without your permission.
i would like to install wine but i need to use sudo for it....what if i was on a system where i didnt have acess to sudo?
